item.text: Who is filling out the survey?
Did you verify HIPAA?
What prompted signing up for Medicaid?
Do you have any urgent healthcare related issues you want to discuss today?
Do you have a PCP you see regularly?
Do you have a PCP you see regularly?
Have you been to a dentist in the past year?
Have you been to a dentist in the past year?
Dentist Name/Practice
Do you have a scheduled appointment for a dental cleaning/check up?
Do you have any of the following? Select all that apply.
Have you been to the ED or had an Inpatient stay in the past 3 months? If yes for chronic condition, Risk 3.
Do you need to use medical care, mental health, home health or other health services at least once every 3 months?
Are you taking 5 or more prescriptions?
In general, compared to other people your age, would you say your  health is:--if member responds with fair/poor ask next question
Are you currently pregnant or intend to become pregnant in the next year? If pregnant or in need of method of contraception, help to schedule PCP or OB/GYN visit
Do you smoke or use tobacco products?
Have you or has anyone ever expressed concerns about your use of alcohol or any drugs, including prescriptions?
Are you currently or have you experienced depression, anxiety or other mental health issues?
Do you feel controlled, isolated or afraid by anyone in your life?
Do you have any non-healthcare relate needs you are unable to afford? Select all that apply. If food/housing, Risk 3.
What is the Member's risk level?

item.text: HIPAA Verified?
(Case Manager instructs on goals of program) Member agrees to participate in Case Management?
Are you comfortable speaking with me in English?
Is there need for interpretive services?
Do you have a primary care provider?
Do you have a primary care provider?
Do you have difficulty accessing a primary care physician?
During the past 12 months have you visited your doctor's office?
During the past 12 months have you visited your doctor's office?
How many visits have you had with your PCP in the last 12 months?
Do you see a specialist(s) (Please add specialists to the Provider tab)?
Do you see a specialist(s) (Please add specialists to the Provider tab)?
Have you had your blood pressure checked within the last 12 months?
Is your blood pressure at or under the target your doctor recommends?
Have you had your cholesterol levels measured within the last 12 months?
How many times have you been to the urgent care/walk-in clinic in the past 12 months?
How many times have you been to the emergency department/emergency room in the past 12 months?
How many times have you been in the hospital overnight or longer in the past 12 months?
Have you had a flu shot within the last 12 months?
Have you had a pneumonia shot within the past 5 years?
(Case Manager to answer) Did you document the height and weight on the clinical tracker?
BMI (Case Manager to answer) Is the member considered underweight (BMI<20)?
BMI (Case Manager to answer) Is the member considered overweight or obese (BMI>25)?
For Females: When was the last time you had a pap smear (Select option and enter date in free text box)?
For Females: Would you like to become pregnant within the next year?
What chronic conditions do you have?
What chronic conditions do you have?
What chronic conditions do you have?
What chronic conditions do you have?
What chronic conditions do you have?
What chronic conditions do you have?
What chronic conditions do you have?
Do you have a self-management action plan for your condition(s)?
Do you have any vision problems?
Do you have a hearing problem?
Do you have any problems with your appetite?
Do you have difficulty swallowing?
Do you have any of the following symptoms (Select all that apply)?
Are you on any type of special diet (Select all that apply)?
Do you have chronic pain (pain that has been treated for 6 months or more)?
Are you being treated by a doctor or clinic for your pain?
Do you have any skin problems or wounds?
Are you prescribed medications but not taking them?
Do you ever forget to take or refill your medication?
Do you take your medications exactly as your doctor has instructed you to?
Are you careless at times about taking your medications?
Sometimes if you feel worse when taking your medicine, do you stop taking it?
Are you able to afford your medications?
Do transportation issues prevent you from obtaining your medications?
(Case Manager to answer) Have you completed medication reconciliation with member?
Which of the following activities are you UNABLE to perform without assistance (Select all that apply)?
Do you use assistive devices for any of these activities?
(Case Manager to answer) Does the member require assistance or is dependent with two (2) or more activities of daily living (ADLs)?
Do you use any Medical equipment (i.e. glucometer, cane, oxygen, CPAP, nebulizer, walker, etc) in addition to devices indicated above?
Do you have a support system?
Who is the PRIMARY caregiver/support?
(Case Manager) Does the member have adequate caregiver/support?
Which of the following the community resources are currently being used (check all that apply)?
Which of the following the community resources are currently being used (check all that apply)?
Which of the following the community resources are currently being used (check all that apply)?
Which of the following the community resources are currently being used (check all that apply)?
Which of the following the community resources are currently being used (check all that apply)?
Does the member have access to appropriate community resources?
(Case Manager) Does the member need additional community resources?
Which of the following the community resources are needed?
Which of the following the community resources are needed?
Does the member have transportation issues accessing needed medical services?
Is the member unable to afford any of the following: (Select all that apply)?
Are there any non-healthcare related needs the member is unable to afford (Select all that apply)?
Are there any non-healthcare related needs the member is unable to afford (Select all that apply)?
Are there any non-healthcare related needs the member is unable to afford (Select all that apply)?
Your housing situation can be described as (select one):
(Case Manager) Does the member have a stable housing situation?
Have you had any falls either inside or outside your home in the last 12 months?
Do you have problems learning about your medical condition because of understanding written materials that you get from your doctors, hospitals and pharmacists?

I would like to talk to you about any problems that you may have in getting everything you need to stay healthy? Do you need to have someone help you read instructions, pamphlets, or other written materials you get from your doctor or pharmacist?
Do you have any trouble filling out medical forms?
Do you have any cultural, religious or social practices that may affect your medical treatment or nutrition?
Over the past 2 weeks, have you felt down, depressed or hopeless?
Over the past 2 weeks have you felt little interest or pleasure in doing things?
(Case Manager to answer) Did you answer yes to either of the depression screening questions?
Over the past 2 weeks have you thought about harming yourself in any way?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you had trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you felt down, depressed or hopeless?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you felt down, depressed or hopeless?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you felt tired or had little energy?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you had a poor appetite or overeating?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you felt bad about yourself-or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you noticed yourself moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite-being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you thought that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you thought that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you thought that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way?
(Case Manager to answer) Total score from PHQ-9 is (add values in front of each answer option in this section to get your PHQ-9 score):
Have you made any plans or considered how you might harm yourself?
Have you ever attempted to harm yourself in the past?
Did you tell anyone that you were going to commit suicide, or threatened that you might hurt yourself?
Did you tell anyone that you were going to commit suicide, or threatened that you might hurt yourself?
Who did you tell?
Do you think you might hurt yourself before you see your doctor again?

In an average week, how many times do you perform at least 30 minutes of physical activity (Physical activity is any activity causing you to breathe heavier and your heart to beat faster. Examples: Walking, jogging, swimming, participating in sports, resistance training, etc)?
Have you ever smoked or used tobacco products?
Are you ready to make a plan to stop smoking?
Are you currently in treatment for a mental health condition?
In the past year, have you continued to use alcohol or drugs longer than you intended?
Have you ever neglected some of your usual responsibilities because of alcohol or drug use?
Have you ever wanted to cut down or stop using alcohol or drugs but couldn't?
Has your family, a friend or anyone else ever told you they objected to your alcohol or drug use?
Have you ever found yourself preoccupied with wanting to use alcohol or drugs?
Have you ever used alcohol or drugs to relieve emotional discomfort, such as sadness, anger or boredom?
(Case Manager to Answer) What is the member's UNCOPE Assessment Score?
Have you been treated with disrespect, shamed, or humiliated by your current partner?
Do you feel controlled or isolated by your current partner?
Have you been made to feel afraid, threatened or physically hurt by your current partner?
Have you ever been pressured or forced to do sexual things you didn't want to do?
Have you had any of these experiences with an ex-partner?
Does Member screen positive for risk of intimate partner violence or domestic assault? (Member responds 'Yes' to any of the above questions)
Do you ever experience anxiousness, or take medicine for anxiety?
In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge?
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things
Trouble relaxing
Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
Becoming easily annoyed or irritable
Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
(Case Manager to Answer) What is the member's GAD-7 Score?
Do you have an advance directive?
(Case Manager to answer) Is the member interested in talking about advance care planning or Durable Power of Attorney for healthcare?
Do you consider your health to be Excellent, Good, Fair or Poor?
What is the member's short term personal health goal (SMART format: Specific, Measurable, Actionable, Realistic, Time limited)?
What is the member's long term personal health goal (SMART format: Specific, Measurable, Actionable, Realistic, Time limited)?
Is  there anything you feel may get in the way of you being able to complete your goals?
On a scale of 0-10, with 0 being not at all convinced and 10 being as convinced as you can be, how convinced are you that it is important to change (stated participant goal)
On  a scale of 0-10, with 0 being not at all confident and 10 being as confident as you can be, how confident are you that you can accomplish the goals we discussed?
(Case Manager to answer) What stage of change is the member in?
Is follow up required?
What is the plan for follow up?
What is the best way to get in touch with you (phone, email, text, etc.)?
Is there a time of day that is better to get in touch with you (early morning, after 5pm, etc)?
